remarks: Lemma for ~ ibladd .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
ibladd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
ibladd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
ibladd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D = ( B + C ) ) $.
ibladd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. MblFn ) $.
ibladd.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. MblFn ) $.
ibladd.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ B ) , B , 0 ) ) ) e. RR ) $.
ibladd.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ C ) , C , 0 ) ) ) e. RR ) $.
ibladdlem $p |- ( ph -> ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> if ( ( x e. A /\ 0 <_ D ) , D , 0 ) ) ) e. RR ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
